data.name: Minion Masters - Season of Raging Heat Battle Pass
data.detailed_description:
Level up your Battle Pass! - Unlock Awesome loot!


As you play Minion Masters you level up your Battle Pass, unlocking extra loot worth more than 20,000 Rubies!

Loot found in this Season’s Battle Pass:


How does it work?


There are 2 types of Season Pass.

Free Pass and Battle Pass.

Everyone can level up the Free Pass and get the rewards from it. But if you want the insane value from the Battle Pass, you will need to invest 1500 rubies or 9.99 $ to unlock it.

There are 70 tiers of rewards that you can get by playing with a Battle Pass.
If you own the Battle Pass you also get the Free Pass rewards..

The way you unlock new tiers is by playing the game and winning!

There is also a endless mode once you reach 70 tiers so you can keep receiving rewards until the end of the season.

FAQs

How do I buy the Battle Pass?

Buy it either in the in-game shop for rubies or directly on Steam.

What if I buy the Battle Pass after i already unlocked multiple free tiers?


As soon as you buy the Battle Pass you will receive all the rewards up to the tiers you’ve already unlocked by playing with the Free Pass, retroactively.

How long is a Battle Pass season?

Around 2 Months.

Do i keep my rewards?

Yes! You keep cosmetics, currency and new cards you unlock.

Are there skins in both the Free Pass and Battle Pass?

Yes!

Will Season Pass skins be available after the season ends?

In the future we would like a system, that allows new players to get old Season Pass skins they missed out on. However If we get a system for it, it will be in a limited capacity, and it will be harder to get them than playing with the original Battle Pass.

Is there any way to progress in the Battle Passfaster?

You can purchase new tiers for rubies (skipping the leveling).
The more glory your cards have the faster it will be to unlock new tiers.

What is Glory?

Cards gain glory when you get a duplicate card. The amount of glory gained depends on rarity. Glory stays on the card forever.
E.g: You have a swarmer minion with 6 glory, then you receive one more swarmer and now that minion has 8 glory. Because common minions give 2 glory for each new minion you get, to a max of 400 glory.
(there are also other ways to get glory but this is the most common)

data.short_description: As you play Minion Masters you level up your Battle Pass, unlocking extra loot worth more than 20,000 Rubies!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
